# AIMO Standard

> AIMO Standard is an open standard for AI governance, audit evidence, and agentic AI risk
> management. It provides a structured taxonomy (8 dimensions, 91 codes), minimum evidence
> requirements, validation tooling, and audit-ready artifact schemas for enterprise AI compliance.
>
> License: Apache-2.0. Free to use, adapt, and redistribute.
> Cite: https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/cite/
> Version: 0.1.2 (released 2026-02-13)
> Repository: https://github.com/billyrise/aimo-standard

## Core Standard

- [Overview](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/01-overview/): What AIMO Standard is, why it exists, and how it addresses shadow AI and agentic AI risk.
- [Scope](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/02-scope/): Applicability boundaries, target organizations, and in-scope AI system categories.
- [Taxonomy](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/03-taxonomy/): The 8-dimension taxonomy for classifying AI usage. Core conceptual framework.
- [Taxonomy Codes](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/04-codes/): All 91 taxonomy codes with definitions. The complete classification vocabulary.
- [ID Policy and Namespace](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/04b-id-policy-namespace/): How taxonomy code identifiers are assigned and governed.
- [Dictionary](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/05-dictionary/): Term definitions for all concepts used across the standard.
- [Evidence Template](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/06-ev-template/): The canonical evidence record format for documenting AI system usage.
- [Validator](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/07-validator/): Schema validation rules and how to use the AIMO Validator.
- [Evidence Bundle Structure](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/09-evidence-bundle-structure/): How to package evidence records into a compliant audit bundle.
- [Changelog](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/08-changelog/): Version history of the standard specification.
- [Roadmap v0.2](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/standard/current/10-roadmap-v0.2/): Planned features and direction for the next major version.

## Artifacts

- [Artifacts Overview](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/): Index of all downloadable artifacts and tooling outputs.
- [Evidence Bundle](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/evidence-bundle/): Template and specification for assembling a complete audit evidence bundle.
- [Minimum Evidence Requirements](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/minimum-evidence/): The minimum set of evidence fields required per taxonomy code for audit readiness.
- [Evidence Bundle Coverage Map](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/evidence-bundle-coverage-map/): Maps evidence bundle contents to regulatory framework requirements.
- [Justified Non-Compliance](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/justified-non-compliance/): How to document and justify deviations from standard requirements.
- [ISO 42001 Certification Readiness Toolkit](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/iso-42001-certification-readiness-toolkit/): Structured toolkit for organizations pursuing ISO 42001 certification.
- [Signature Verification Roadmap](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/signature-verification-roadmap/): Plan for cryptographic signing and verification of evidence bundles.
- [Log Schemas — Agent Activity](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/log-schemas/agent-activity/): Schema for logging agentic AI system actions for audit.
- [Log Schemas — Shadow AI Discovery](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/artifacts/log-schemas/shadow-ai-discovery/): Schema for documenting shadow AI discovery findings.

## Coverage Map (Regulatory Alignment)

- [Coverage Map Overview](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/): How AIMO Standard evidence maps to international AI regulations.
- [EU AI Act](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/eu-ai-act/): Mapping of AIMO evidence requirements to EU AI Act Annex IV obligations.
- [ISO 42001](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/iso-42001/): Coverage of ISO 42001:2023 AI management system requirements.
- [ISO 42006](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/iso-42006/): Coverage of ISO 42006 AI audit requirements.
- [NIST AI RMF](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/nist-ai-rmf/): Alignment with NIST AI Risk Management Framework.
- [ISMS Integration](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/isms/): Integration guidance for ISO 27001 / ISMS practitioners.
- [Procurement and Disclosure](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/procurement-and-disclosure/): Coverage for AI procurement transparency and supplier disclosure obligations.
- [Coverage Methodology](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/coverage-map/methodology/): How coverage assessments are conducted and scored.

## Conformance

- [Conformance](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/conformance/): Conformance levels, self-assessment process, and certification pathway.

## Validator

- [Validator](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/validator/): Command-line and API validator for AIMO evidence bundles and taxonomy codes.

## Examples

- [Examples](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/examples/): Sample evidence bundles, taxonomy usage, and audit scenarios.

## Governance

- [Governance Overview](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/): Organizational governance structure for AIMO Standard.
- [Trust Package](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/trust-package/): The canonical trust package for relying parties and auditors.
- [Responsibility Boundary](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/responsibility-boundary/): Scope of responsibility for AIMO Standard Contributors.
- [Human Oversight Protocol](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/human-oversight-protocol/): Requirements for human oversight of AI systems documented under this standard.
- [How to Cite](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/cite/): Citation instructions for research, audit reports, and regulatory submissions.
- [License](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/license/): Apache-2.0 license terms for AIMO Standard.
- [Contributing](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/governance/contributing/): How to contribute to the standard.

## Releases

- [Releases](https://standard.aimoaas.com/latest/releases/): Release notes, downloadable artifacts (PDF, ZIP), and version history.

## Full Text

- [llms-full.txt](https://standard.aimoaas.com/llms-full.txt): Complete concatenated text of all English documentation pages for LLM ingestion.
